1054980.name: The Cat and the Box
1054980.description:
The Cat and the Box is a story-rich game in which a brave player might struggle to save their soul.
  • Explore 12 levels and complete 5 2D arcade games
  • Meet fallen creatures in the only City
  • Fight with a demon for your soul

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Esc or Alt+Tab to pause and view options
  • Space to jump
  • E to interact
